items.sentence: Tom realized that Mary shouldn't be doing what she was doing.
Tom realized that there was nothing he could do to help Mary.
Tom soon realized that there was nothing he could do to help.
Cycling to work saves Tom thirty dollars a week in bus fares.
Tom and Mary haven't told anyone they're getting married yet.
You should've waited until October to come back to Australia.
You're the only person I know who has ever visited Australia.
I've tried calling Tom all day, but his phone is always busy.
You know that eventually everyone's going to know about this.
When was the last time that your defrosted your refrigerator?
